message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $11,500. I believe it will be highly valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your budget constraints, $9,800 is significantly below its value. I could consider $11,000, which is a fair compromise.
I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $11,000. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $10,500. Can you consider that?
